data.text: @SenTinaSmith That was just trying to placate leadership. And they needed those creeps elsewhere. Makes no difference on what there are doing!  They must be stopped from making traffic stops (1). They must not be allowed to harass observers or targets.(2)

@SenTinaSmith STOP interfering with federal officers who are doing their duty to uphold federal law.  

Trump didn't make up immigration law. CONGRESS did - years ago.  

And MOST Americans voted last year to uphold that law.

This is what Democracy looks like.  But apparently, people in the
@bitchmobile @SenTinaSmith It's exhausting, just how goddamn anti-American they are.
@Darcoby1964 @SenTinaSmith They can’t stop telling us how much they hate us.

@Lacus09 @SenTinaSmith @yvette40696601 Is this the honorable man the Dems tried to sting but he didn't bite ? Yes.  What this man has done for us in all his years, keeping us safe - you low life pos isn't for to lick the mud off his boots. Gfy psycho fascist  bitch

@SenTinaSmith @NGorhamA4S4 Why? Cuz you are out of your mind?  How is it you think you know better than the professionals?  What gives you the idea that mob rule is a thing?  This is America. There will be law and order. We the people have delivered the mandate. G. F. Y.
